# Streamline yourfitness business

Supercharge your fitness business with the powerful tools and services provided by KurlClub, let’s#kurlit

Get started

![hero](https://www.kurlclub.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fpng%2Fhero-banner.png&w=3840&q=75)

##### Start and Grow

Everything you need

Enjoy a full fledged dashboard with powerful member and staff management tools, integrated attendance device tracking, and WhatsApp connectivity

###### Automation & Productivity

Automate your fitness business with KurlClub. Eliminate repetitive office work and let smart automation handle admin tasks — so you can focus on growing your gym, not managing it.

###### Device Flexibility & Compatibility

Work from any device, anywhere. KurlClub is built to perform seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and smartphones, ensuring your gym operations never skip a beat.

###### WhatsApp Integration

Stay connected effortlessly. Send reminders, updates, and promotional messages directly through WhatsApp fully integrated within KurlClub.

###### AI-Powered Efficiency

Smarter workflows with AI. Create custom workout and diet plans or generate WhatsApp message templates all with the help of KurlClub’s built-in AI assistant.

##### Features

## All-in-One Platform

Complete fitness business management with smart attendance tracking (NFC tap, biometrics, gate entry), automated billing based on dues, trainer management, and WhatsApp integration

### Empower your business with strategicinsights

Enjoy a full fledged dashboard with powerful member and staff management tools, integrated attendance device tracking, and WhatsApp connectivity

![Feature](https://www.kurlclub.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fpng%2Ffeature1.png&w=1080&q=75)

### Whatsapp Integration features

Monitor client progress, manage workout timings, and evaluate trainer performance with advanced fitness management features designed to keep your gym running smoothly and your team performing at its best.

![Feature](https://www.kurlclub.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fpng%2Ffeature3.png&w=1080&q=75)

### Staff & Membermanagement

Stay on top of every session with intelligent tools to track client progress, manage workout schedules, and monitor trainer performance — ensuring your gym never misses a beat.

##### faq's

Frequently askedquestions

### What is KurlClub gym management software?

KurlClub is a comprehensive gym management software designed for fitness centers, gyms, yoga studios, dance classes, and martial arts centers in India and GCC. It offers member management, NFC attendance tracking, automated billing, trainer management, and a mobile app for seamless gym operations.

### Does KurlClub work for yoga studios and dance classes?

Yes! KurlClub is perfect for all types of fitness businesses including yoga studios, dance classes, Zumba centers, martial arts dojos, boxing clubs, and traditional gyms. Our platform is designed to handle the unique needs of different fitness studio types with customizable features.

### How does the NFC attendance tracking system work?

KurlClub's NFC attendance system allows members to check-in instantly by tapping their NFC card or phone. This eliminates manual attendance tracking, reduces queues, and provides real-time attendance data for gym owners and trainers to monitor member engagement.

### Is KurlClub available in India and GCC countries?

Yes, KurlClub is specifically designed for the India and GCC markets including UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Oman, Bahrain, and Kuwait. We understand local business requirements, payment methods, and provide customer support in multiple languages and time zones.
